name: CyberSphere (LeonidB)
description:
CyberSphere is a twin stick 3d shooter in sci-fi setting with multiplayer support, lots of unique characters, weapons, and enemies.

Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/...
App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/us/ap...

Key features:
  • - Nice 3D graphics;
  • - LAN multiplayer (PVE and PVP);
  • - 25 weapons;
  • - 11 character types - futuristic tanks, walking robots, cyborgs and soldiers, each with unique special ability;
  • - 12 types of AI-controlled support drone models; 
  • - Easiness of control. Gamepad supported;
  • - A variety of enemies. Robots, aliens, cyborgs, and dangerous bosses.
